routes.pageSubtitle: Choose from the most spectacular destinations in Paraty and embark on an unforgettable journey through the crystal clear waters of the Rio de Janeiro coast

lagoaAzul.descricao: Visit the famous Blue Lagoon with its crystal clear waters and white sand beaches. Includes stops at Red Beach and other paradisiacal coves.

praiasDesertas.descricao: Discover isolated and untouched beaches, accessible only by sea. A unique experience of connection with nature.

sacoMamangua.descricao: Navigate through Brazil's only tropical fjord. Stunning landscapes surrounded by mountains covered with Atlantic rainforest.

porDoSol.descricao: Experience the most romantic sunset in Paraty on board, with a privileged view of the islands and mountains at dusk.

ilhasParadisiacas.descricao: Complete tour of the region's main islands. Explore multiple beaches and coves in one unforgettable day.

mergulhoSnorkel.descricao: Discover Paraty's marine life with snorkeling equipment. Clear waters full of tropical fish.
